author: Simon Difford
description: Exactly as it says on the tin: a classic Daiquiri with a fruity splash of freshly squeezed orange juice.
name: Orange Daiquiri
recipeIngredient: 60 ml White/gold 1-3 year old mellow light rum
10 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
